member.name: F:MaterialDesignThemes.Wpf.ComboBoxAssist.ShowSelectedItemProperty
member.summary: By default the selected item is hidden from the drop down list, as per Material Design specifications. To revert to a more classic Windows desktop behaviour, and show the currently selected item again in the drop down, set this attached propety to true.
